jobs.title: Design Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Interaction is looking for design engineers to join our team in California.
We have several and only hiring the very best.

Apply if you:

  • Are passionate and opinionated about technology & design

  • Can talk for hours about the pros and cons of Arc, Roam, Tana, Hey.com, Things, Cron, Raycast, ...

  • Are native in Next/React, SwiftUI, ...

Interaction is looking for design engineers to join our team in California.
We have several and only hiring the very best.

 - Are native in Next/React, SwiftUI, ...

jobs.title: Other
jobs.descriptionHtml: Interested in joining Interaction but don’t see a matching role? Apply here!
jobs.descriptionPlain: Interested in joining Interaction but don’t see a matching role? Apply here!

jobs.title: Member of Technical Staff
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Interaction is looking for exceptional AI engineers to join our team in California as Members of the Technical Staff.

Interaction is well-funded and only hiring the very best.

Existing team members have left the world's leading quant shops and university labs to build real products for billions of humans at Interaction. We've successfully built million-dollar ventures before, won medals at international science olympiads, and genuinely enjoy our work.

Apply for the MTS role if you:

  • Want to work at the very frontier of artificial intelligence

  • Talk more to GPT and Claude than your parents

  • Have scaled backend services in production before
